name: Ghost Chase (Michael Cox)
description:
Oh no, you fell into a haunted house! Escape before ghosts mess you up.

Ghost Chase is an arcade-style action game for the Nintendo Game Boy (Color recommended, but compatible with all models) and Analogue Pocket, or will run right here in your browser. Download the ROM for hardware / emulation use.

Controls:

KeyboardGame BoyFunctionArrows/WASDD-padMovement
EnterStartPauseZAInteractABSpecial

Credits:
Game Design & Music by Michael Cox
Graphics by Johan Vinet (Canari Games), Michael Cox and Poloviiinkin
Sound Effects by Coffee 'Valen' Bat
